words: Last week was a little wild. He's, like, literally dating other people in front of you.
In front of our faces.
Yeah. And then you're getting cut off by, like, someone blowing an air horn in my face, so things like that.
I can't‐‐yeah.

Last week was a little dramatic. Onyeka and I had some drama. I know that there was some tension between Caelynn and Hannah B., and then last night, there was some drama with Tracy and Demi at the cocktail party. So I'm hoping all the drama is over and I can focus on Colton going into this next week. I hope to God that I'm on a date this week.
I'm staying very optimistic to be on the date card this week. I think it's gonna happen.
Good morning.
Hey!
Y'all come on inside.
Hi!
How's everybody doing today?
Good.
So how was last week, actually getting into the swing of things here?
Last week was a lot of really high highs and a lot really low lows. You second‐guess yourself a lot with everything that's going on.

To be honest, that's‐‐ I mean, that's part of it. Like, there will be highs, and then there will be lows. That's the way it goes. That's love. My advice-- take advantage of your time with Colton. So this week, three dates... Two group dates and the amazing, romantic one‐on‐one date. It's gonna be a good week. Date card right here.
Ooh!
Just leave that there.
Thanks, Chris.
Have a great week. I bet I'll be seeing you around.
See you soon! Bye!
I think that we all are kind of hoping we can have the one‐on‐one.
Katie.
Yes.
Heather.
Hannah B.
Oh, yay.
I'm so excited. I get to go on a group date with Colton.
Courtney. Kirpa.
Yay.
But I am hoping that Caelynn's name is not on the card...
Tracy. Demi.
Because I competed in pageants with Caelynn for years, and she's somebody who I don't get along with.
Caelynn.
Oh. Whoa.
"I'm looking for life's greatest treasure. Colton."
Oh, God, I'm so glad I have you.

Hannah and Caelynn know each other from pageants, but they had a falling‐out and they are no longer friends. And now they're on a group date, so... it's gonna be interesting to see how they handle it.
Let's go. Bye, y'all.

I think today will be interesting, because Hannah B. and I have had our differences But I don't want our past to come in between more important things, like Colton. So I just want to have fun on the date today and just be with Colton.
Guys, I am so excited. Let's go, ladies! Let's do it! Oh, my gosh.

context: all cheering, all cheering, all cheering
words: This is a story of love and heartbreak. But also a pirate story. This is the story of Captain Colton. In search of the greatest treasure the world has ever seen-- love.
Colton's standing on this pirate boat, and he's looking sexy as hell. And I'm like, "Hello, Colton. "Life's greatest treasure is standing right in front of you."
Hey, you knuckleheads! Knock it off!
Oh! Yeah!
Oh, my God, Colton's so sexy.
Come on down.
I'm like, "Wow." I think today is gonna be fun.
Well, first off, welcome to my pirate ship. Today I would like to introduce you to two of my friends-- pirates Chris and Cindy.
Ahoy, ladies.
Ahoy!
I hear you be searching for love, aye?
Aye! Arr!
Now, ladies, you're gonna learn how to be pirates. At the end of that training, two of you will be chosen to compete for Captain Colton's heart.
Yes!
What I want you to do is go get changed and meet me back here on the ship. Aye?
Aye! Aye, aye!
Good.
The two best pirates are going to compete for Colton's heart, and it's perfect for me because I'm a cutthroat kind of chick.
I feel like Shakira, Shakira.
The job of a pirate is to steal, and I'm here to steal Colton's heart. I don't want to be another one of those yo‐ho‐hos.
On to the pirate training!
Aye!
You are going to be taking these and trying to knock each other off.
Here we go.
I am so excited to get in there and show what I can do.
Begin!
Oh!
I'm the winner.
You win.
Your weapon.
I am super competitive.
Arr!
There we go.
So I'm going to step up to the plate, and the Hannah monster is gonna come out.
Begin.
Oh, .
Begin!
Hannah gets so intense in competition...
Begin!
Hannah, you're strong. I know you're strong, so, like, be‐‐be gentle. So I'm nervous, because there is just, like, a weird tension thing between us. I don't like this.
Okay, Hannah! I know how strong she is. That's not fair.
I'm killing this right now, and I definitely think he noticed me.
You did a good job.
Feel pretty good. So I'm feeling good.
Yeah. Oh, there's something going on over there.
Ouch, I lost an eye.
It's a little frustrating to watch Caelynn engage with Colton right in front of me.
Nailed it.
I'm trying my hardest to not get upset.
Come down to the captain.
But then Caelynn's just everywhere.
Oh, my gosh. It's like, ugh. I didn't come here to compete in another pageant.
So we have made a decision. There are gonna be two of you competing for Captain Colton's heart.
Tracy.
And the other woman we chose-- Caelynn.
Great job.
Honestly, um... this sucks.
I'm excited.
I'm so excited.
And the rest of you get to watch from the poop deck right over there.
I'm gonna slide on the eye patch and pretend like I can't see it.
Is there anyone who thinks that they have the strength or the courage to save Captain Colton?
I will save you, my captain!
Not if I get to you first!
I am so excited to save Captain Colton. I think I'm gonna win. That's what I'm here for.
Go!
I don't think it's possible for Tracy to win. She is the worst pirate I've ever seen.
Here comes Tracy down the rope.
It feels good to be a pirate. A winning pirate, hopefully.
Let's go, ladies!
Tracy goes down!
There goes Caelynn, up to untie Colton.
Are you saving me?
I am!
Oh, you gotta cut it.
Caelynn saves Colton!

It's not easy to see Caelynn continue moving forward with Colton. It brings out all of my insecurities, and I start to spiral. But if Colton knew the truth about Caelynn‐‐ who she truly is‐‐ I think he would feel differently about her, and he needs to know tonight.
Oh, it's cute. This is cool. Today was really, really, really fun. This is actually really cute.

Feelings are definitely developing for Colton. I feel like each week that goes by, it gets deeper and deeper. But it's hard on the group date to really have that really deep connection, and so a lot of the girls are feeling extremely nervous.
I just want to let you guys know how much fun I had today, and it was really cool to see all of your personalities start to come out. So let's make a toast to that.
Cheers.

I think it is gonna be pretty crazy with all of the girls fighting for Colton's time and attention‐‐ maybe a little catty and whatnot‐‐ especially because the two pageant girls don't get along. I'm sure that they're each thinking, "There can be only one." But I'm not worried about the other girls. Hopefully they crash and burn.
One thing that I noticed is just how real you keep it. Just watching you in, like, the group setting today, you were having so much fun.
I was having so much fun.
Yeah.
Like, weren't you?
Yeah.
We were literally... I was, like, probably being a weirdo.
A dork.
But‐‐
You were.
I was?
You were too, so‐‐
Okay, good.
Well, we have that in common.
I just like to call you out.
I'll give it right back to you, so...
Good, good.
You know, our time together is always very effortless... And we have a lot in common too, so I have a really good read‐‐
So much in common. Like, if we started listing our, like, five favorite things, like, I'd be scared.
Did it.
Sashimi.
Food will always be a passion of mine.
I hate it. I said it on "Ellen." I was like, "Oh, my God, I'm so dumb."
Yeah, that's‐‐that's why I was like, "If she's talking about food..."
I was like, "We're in this to win this."
Great first impression.
But...
I like you. I think you are so great.
I like you too.
There is no other Katie.
Yeah. Mm.
The rose is up for grabs, but I think, based off of the roses that he's been giving, we really don't know his type. And to assume that we know his type, that's just a foolish thing to do.

You used the phrase "his type." I just personally think, when I was younger, I thought I liked a certain type, and I always dated the same type. And then I realized, eventually, I needed to branch out from that.
Well, I can't imagine‐‐ like, if I were an older girl and I was surrounded by younger women, like, I can't imagine how uncomfortable I would feel.
Like, I would be pissed, and I would be like, "Y'all don't know ." You know what I mean? Especially after your experience and everything.
That's not how I view you guys at all. You're taking personally me giving you a different point of view on something.
And it's been made very clear that you're making attacks on me right now.
Like, I'm not sitting here trying to argue with anyone. I don't care to do that.
You make, like, passive‐aggressive comments that you think that I'm not gonna pick up on and I'm just gonna be like, "Okay." But no, I hear what you're saying to me.
Okay. That's fine.
I feel so bad for you.

Tracy, she can be passive‐aggressive and condescending towards me and some of the other girls. I don't like it, but being an older woman around a whole bunch of younger women‐‐ and especially the fact that all of us are so beautiful and she is in the cougar club‐‐ so I would be freaking out if I was her.
How are you?
Good, how are you doing?
The group dates are really intense because you are kind of, like, having to fight for a little bit of attention.
Today was a really fun day, I think. I had a good time, and I didn't think I was gonna have a good time.
I don't ever have to worry about Colton. I know he wants to spend time with me. But I'm gonna do what I have to do tonight to get the rose from Colton.
It's difficult in group settings, and I‐‐
Yeah.
You know, I'm not used to that, so it's just, like‐‐ I don't know.
Hey.
Can I steal you?
Yeah.
Let's go.
Thanks for today.
Yeah.
All right. How are you?
Hi, it's so good to see you.
It's so good seeing you.

I had so much fun today. I just wanted to like, you know, . Today, I remember going, "Oh, my God, like, I'm so excited to see him." And, like, every time, like, I smell you, I'm like, "Mmm." You know what I mean?
Yeah.
And I can tell I always make you nervous.
Yes.
It's really fun, though.
Yeah.
I think the other girls, whenever they spend their time with Colton, they're all doing the same thing.
I'm gonna blindfold you. Is that okay?
Oh, boy. Yeah.
And so I'm gonna stand out, whereas they're all just gonna blend in and he's gonna get over it.
Just bend over a little bit. Bend over a little bit. Trust me.
I'm blindfolded and bending over.
Yeah.
All right. And now I'm getting spanked. Okay.
I think that he really appreciates how I have fun with him and I'm not all serious all the time.
Are you feeling nervous?
Um, yep.
You feeling a little more nervous?
Yep.
Nervous?
Look at it. It's a fake hand.
I'm the only one who challenges Colton, and I excite him, and I make him nervous.
I'm, like, 'cause I'm so pissed.
Why?
Demi came and took him It's okay. We talked. We didn't talk that long...
Yeah.
And Demi came up and... Sorry, I'm just, like‐‐ It just‐‐the way‐‐ the tone of voice.
Right.
The‐‐the mannerisms.
Yeah.
The way you do it, you know?
That's all that matters.
There's also all the other factors.
I mean, obviously, everyone would want the rose, but at the end of the day‐‐
Do you wanna come chat with me?
Okay, sure.
Do you want to go over here? So I just think sometimes your delivery can be... maybe a little different than you would like it to be, and the way‐‐
What?
The way that you did it, it just seemed very saucy to me.
That doesn't make‐‐ that doesn't make any sense to me.
Just be more aware. I think it's really easy‐‐
I'm going to be who I am, and I‐‐I'm always aware.
I know. I'm not saying don't be who you are.
Yeah, I know. But I am annoyed by this conversation. I'm not gonna do this, dude.

Courtney had a problem with, like, the tone that I was using, and that just didn't make any sense to me. I don't understand what she wanted me to do. Um, lower my voice or something? None of the girls really have the balls to, like, maintain a problem with me. They know that I'm not afraid of them and I'm gonna stand up for myself, and they're intimidated by my confidence and how untouchable I am, so I'm not worried about them.
How do you guys think the date's going?
They're probably at that cocktail party right now, and I bet you things are going down. Like, for sure. Like, people are stealing Colton from who knows who, like...
Date card.
I want to be on the date card. It would be nice to be able to have a full day with him. That'd be a great spot to be in, to be honest.
Elyse.
Oh, my gosh! Oh, my goodness.
"Love is in the air."
Oh, my gosh. Okay! Oh, my goodness. Yes!
I'm pretty sad I didn't get a date tonight, obviously.
That'd be great.
It's hard to see someone else... like, get that when it's something you really want.
Cheers to you getting a date card.
Yes.
I'm so scared I'm gonna be the one who doesn't get a date this week. I'm just... Worried about not getting time.
Who would think that you're having a date at an antique shop?
Right?
It's so beautiful.
Yes.
You look beautiful tonight.
Thank you. You look really great yourself.
How you doing?
I'm good. I seriously had the best time. It was fun. I'm glad I got to save you.
I'm glad you got to save me too. I wanted to let you know, though... I know at times, for me, this is a little difficult...
Mm‐hmm.
And I felt like... you know, in the moment...
Mm‐hmm.
That we were having up there, I sort of‐‐
It's awkward. It's just awkward.

Yeah, and I‐‐ and I wanted to talk to you about that, because I didn't do it right. Because it was‐‐ it was our moment, and it's something that, you know, I struggle with, especially because I like you, and...
I like you too.
Wanted to do something that I should have done up there.
And what's that?
Give you a real kiss.
Mm.
When I'm with Caelynn, my guard comes completely down.
Winner.
That's crazy.
The pirate‐‐the pirate champ.
No one expected that. Everyone was like, "Caelynn's not winning."
Caelynn continues to really just be a lot of the things that I'm looking for. So I'm so excited for Caelynn and I's relationship.
I could just kiss you for days.
We used to be friends, that's the freaking weird thing is the person that I was friends with is a different personality than this girl.
This is what I think. If you genuinely believe and like, she is that way, then, like you have to tell him.
You keep surprising me, and I like it. I like you.
Thank you.
It is hard to see him developing a connection with her, because I know her. I'm, like, "be‐fumbled." Like, I mean, I don't know another word.
I'll take the top.
I don't think she's showing her true self and every side of her. That's why I'm, like... so shook. So he needs to know the truth.
How are you?
Good.
Are you?
Well, I think I have to, like, talk to you about something, and I don't want to.
Well, you want‐‐ what do you want to talk to me about?

I just, like, have something, like, on my mind, and, like... I feel like it's, like, bothering me, in a way, and I just need to, like, tell you, and then I don't know. But basically, like, me and Caelynn, we were friends. Like, we were roommates at Miss USA, which is already, like, a really intense situation, and I think we handle stress a lot differently. Then just, like, as the year went on, there was, like, just a few things that happened that‐‐ Like, we‐‐I guess, like, a fallout, I guess you could say. And, like, we haven't‐‐ we haven't talked to each other since.
Is there something, though, like‐‐'cause you said a lot of things happened. Is there something that I should know?
I think it's more like, uh... It was just... I was just in a high-stress situation with her and was, like, the most hostile environment I've ever been in.
Are you saying, like‐‐ is she mean? Is she manipulative? Is she fake? Is she... Well, that‐‐that look's... not a good one.
So it's, like, hard, 'cause I'm like... If that's what you want then you don't want me.
It's like‐‐it's like that?
Like, no, I want‐‐ but, like, that's what I feel like. I'm like...
So you feel like if I even have feelings for her, I can't have feelings for you because you guys are‐‐ you feel like you are that different.
No.
I'm really sorry.
No, it's just‐‐I just think, right now, I just‐‐ I'm gonna have to, like, take some time and just figure this thing out. All right, let's‐‐we'll talk about this later. Okay.
Can you just give me at least a peck?
He friggin' hates me.
Leaving off my conversation with Hannah, I don't feel great about it. I'm... confused, frustrated.
Caelynn, can we go chat?
Yeah.
What was that about?
I have no idea. I have no clue. I‐‐you know, well, I shouldn't.
So what's on your mind?
So... I'm a little‐‐like, right now, I'm just a little confused and frustrated, 'cause...
What's up?
I had a conversation with‐‐ with Hannah.
Oh.
The conversation was along the lines of, your guys' relationship no longer... is good.
Mm‐hmm.

And the words, like, "hostile" and... she had to, like, remove herself from the friendship. And then‐‐quite frankly, I didn't get a lot of clarity on the situation from her side either, so I just wanna talk to you about that.

No, I would love to be completely open and honest. Um, yeah, we were‐‐ we were friends. But then we were in a competitive environment at‐‐at Miss USA, and I feel like... um, we‐‐we handle competition differently. Like, for me, I just‐‐ I get very quiet.
Yeah.

Um, and... there's things that, like, I haven't, like, talked to you about that have been, like, traumatic experiences in my life that deeply hurt me. And‐‐and I mean, it's like‐‐ it's stuff that, like, I've wanted to talk to you about, but it's like...
Right.

It's as the relationship progresses. Like, it's, like, real‐life . It's not just, like‐‐ you know? And it's something that, like, I‐‐I had intentions of bringing up to you because it's some stuff that's, like, affected my life. Um, but not tonight and not right now, you know?
Yeah.
And, um‐‐I don't know.
That's all right.
I just‐‐like, I felt like we had a great time together, and I would hate for you to, like, doubt that ever.
He didn't look comfortable.
He definitely did not. It looked like that was not‐‐ It felt uncomfortable.
It felt very uncomfortable, so, um... and we'll just have to see what happens.
Oh, babe, hey.
Oh. This is extremely uncomfortable now.
Hey.
How are you?
I'm okay.
I want you to know that... I like you a lot. And this is about our time together... and our connection.
And the fact that you saved me today on the pirate ship.
So, Caelynn, will you accept this rose?
I will. Thank you.
Yep.
Come on.

He gave her the first rose. He gave her the second rose. He gave her the rose on the date. Like, he likes her. It's very frustrating... And hurtful. I probably just ruined my chances, and... I don't know how to fix it.
I've been through a lot of adversity in my life, so for her to say some made‐up and try and break up a real relationship, it's incredibly frustrating. It's like‐‐it's infuriating.
Why are you crying? What's up, girl?
I should be happy, but I'm not because it's, like, personal stuff that I don't want‐‐
Yeah, no, you don't have to share with me at all. I was just asking.
Yeah.
For some reason, Hannah B., like, I trigger her. I'm a trigger for her. And I want him to send her home because he's being lied to.

It just, like, sucks, 'cause I should be really happy, and I'm not. Like, I feel like that was taken away from me, like, the joy of getting, like, a date‐‐a group date rose. It was, like... overshadowed, and I'm still not happy. I keep crying.
It's okay. You can be sad.
It's been an emotional couple of days.
I'm shaking. I can't sleep. I don't feel good.

Hannah B. and I, we've been friends. We're not friends anymore. But it's‐‐it's not good. And now she could be ruining my relationship with Colton. I'm scared of her retaliation. Like, what else is she gonna do? I knew this was gonna happen when she came on the show but, like, not to this extent.
What happened with Colton?

I don't remember how I said it. Like, "If you're looking for, like, someone to, like, spend the rest of your life with and you, like, have a connection with her and have a connection with me, like, we're totally different." And then he was like, "Well, that's a bold statement, Hannah." He was like, "I really, really like you, and this is freaking me out."
Last night with Colton, I messed up, but if he's really attracted to both of us and it starts getting smaller and smaller, I don't know what's gonna happen.
I would suck, like, if he sent me home before her. Like, I would be like, "You're a freaking idiot."
What are we doing?
It will be in the air.
You already gave me that hint.
Oh.
Like, that was on a date card.
Today is my first one‐on‐one with Colton. And I'm just stinking excited.
There's only so many things that go in the air. Hot air balloon?
You'll have your answer soon.
I'm looking forward to whatever this date may be. But God forbid there's any sort of bungee cord involved.
Here we are.
Oh, was I wrong?
I've never been in a helicopter.
Me neither.
Oh, now I'm really excited.
Oh, my‐‐ Oh, okay!
Where are we going?
You're going to have to wait to find out
Okeydokey!
Today we are flying to San Diego, and I can't wait to see the look on her face when we get there.
You doing okay?
Incredible.
With Colton, we do have an age difference. I'm six years older than him. So I need to make sure that we're on the same page moving forward.
So welcome to San Diego. Today we are going to Belmont Park. Let's go.
So I am very much looking forward to uninterrupted time with him.
So today this whole entire park is ours to go enjoy. And I know today was supposed to be a one‐on‐one... But it's not.
Why?
It's a group date.
Not pleased. I thought all the girls were gonna be left back home today. That is what a one‐on‐one is.
Okay.
Hey, guys, come on out.
What's going‐‐
How are you?
Hi!
How are you doing?
Around the corner comes the cutest kids ever. That was a great surprise. And a massive sigh of relief that the girls are still back in LA and we get to play with these kids all day long.
Are you guys ready to have fun?
Yeah.
Ditto.
Last one on is a rotten egg! Whoo! First one there!
I've never been to a carnival before.
You've never been to a carnival? One, two, three.
What's your name, babe? Oh, it's nice to meet you.
Colton works with his charity with kids that are hospitalized and getting them out on dates like this, which is really, really touching.
My name's Colton. Nice to meet you.
I saw you. I watched "The Bachelorette" with my mom, all of it.
You did?
To be able to see the smiles on these kids' faces, I'm not sure who was smiling more. I'm a smitten kitten right now.
Is everybody ready?
Yeah!
You don't have to hold on quite so tight.
Colton. Colton! Aww! Whoo! Whoo!
Got it! What toy do you want? One of the emojis?
I never gone to a fair before, but this is my first time, and it's been really fun.
To see a guy that you're potentially starting a relationship with and building a connection with around kids is probably the sexiest thing ever.
You got it. All right, I got you a penguin. All right. So your advice for me with Elyse would be to what?
Get her cotton candy.
Is there anything else? Do you guys have boyfriends?
Once, a boy kissed me on the lips.
You've already had your first kiss?
Yes.
Did you like it?
No!
No?
Oh, boy. Here we go.
Got it! Whoo!
Here you go.
Thank you.
Yes.
Thank you.
Got her a bear.
This is the best group date ever.

The cool thing about this date is, like, this is very, very close to, like, what I do. My little cousin Harper was born with cystic fibrosis at the same time that I was playing, you know, football. So it gave me that platform to really, like, start something that was meaningful. So my charity gets kids out of the hospital.
Right.
And their parents... get to watch them be a kid. I am fortunate enough to get to watch that a lot.
All right, welcome to our ice cream shop. What would you guys like? One at a time.
This day has been like birthdays and Christmases and every holiday just mushed in together.
Rocky road in a cone. Who had that?
Another scoop? My girl. Don't tell, but I gave you the biggest
I don't think any of these kids are gonna be forgetting today, and I know for sure I'm not going to be.
Look at this. Look at the view.
I'm gonna look that way so I don't notice what's about to happen. Why are we stopped?
I just want to thank you for an unbelievable day.
You're stopping‐‐
I had so much fun, and it's so nice to see you so good with the kids.
Aw. Aw.
If this thing stops I'm gonna be so scared.
Feel like we gotta put your hands up.
Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Gotta put your hands up. Gotta put your hands up.
I'm really scared.
Oh, boy!

The highlights of today-- every single moment of this entire day. I got to see a piece of a day in the life with him when it comes to his charity work. It speaks volumes about his character and what he wants to do in this world. After today, I don't care what his age is. I think Colton would be a pretty darn good dad.
That was a good last surprise.
I got one last thing for us.
I thought the surprises were done.
Oh, no, no, no, I'm full of surprises.
Going into today, I was worried about our age difference, thinking we were probably on very different pages, and that's an assumption that he has today proved me wrong in.
Holy cow.
Isn't this gorgeous?
Wow. And now, tonight, I am hoping that we're on the same page... Thank you, thank you, thank you. And that Colton is interested in seeing what could be... going forward.
I had so much fun today.
Me too.
And you absolutely were amazing.

Coming into this, it was a bit apprehensive for me, that maybe we wouldn't be on the same page, and so today, seeing you with all the kids and that your focus was very unlike some other men your age, to be a part of that was incredible.
Yeah. Well, I'm so glad you were by my side for today.
Thank you for having me.
Yeah.
Good day.
Life is, obviously, all about experiences, and it's a lot about what you go through. You're very strong‐minded and...
Just a titch.
That's what's so attractive about you, too, is, you have this confidence and this independence, and I wanted to know, like, why... you are the way you are.

I had something that really shifted my priorities in life. My sister was a labor and delivery nurse, and she was married, and she got pregnant with her second, and unfortunately she started feeling a bit off and found out that she had this tumor that is cancerous, and with her being pregnant at the time and obviously putting that baby first, there wasn't a whole lot the doctors wanted to do besides get that baby as close to term as possible.
Yeah
I mean, it was just incredible what she put her body through to bring that baby into our lives. But... she passed. And it was just... awful. Like, awful.
I can't even imagine what you had to go through or anybody who has to lose somebody that they love and care about.
It changes everything.
Yeah.
So... tough, but now we have a new little member of our family, and now we have this amazing charity in her honor, Sarah's Closet...
Unbelievable.
And we'll give gifts to all the little newborns. It kind of turned, like, darkness into goodness, in some way.
